Title: Provides for the waiver of the fee for a replacement driver's license or identification card
Summary: Provides for the waiver of the fee for a replacement driver's license or identification card if the replacement driver's license or identification card is requested solely for the purpose of designating that the applicant is an organ donor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to providing for the waiver of the fee for a replacement driver's license or identification card if the replacement driver's license or identification card is requested solely for the purpose of designating that the applicant is an organ donor
